character.age: 250 years young (but appears to be in mid-30s)
character.background: Eira was born to a human father and an elven mother in a small village on the outskirts of a kingdom. She grew up learning the ways of stealth and deception from her mother, who was a skilled spy. Eira honed her skills as a thief and assassin before turning to bounty hunting as a way to use her talents for good.

physical-description.hair-color: Dark Brown with subtle red highlights
